japanese: あら！　夏じゃない。/沖田先生と、なに話してたの？
english: Oh! Natsu.  /What were you and Okita-sensei talking about?

japanese: あはは！　違うわよ！/バレーボール模様の/普通の大きさのマシュマロよ。
english: Ahaha ! That's not it ! /It's a volleyball-patterned  /regular marshmallow.

japanese: あら、ももちゃん！/部室で出し物の準備？
english: Oh, Momo-chan ! /Prepping in the club room?

japanese: あら、バツ……どうしたの？/そんな仏頂面で。
english: Oh, Batsu... what's wrong?  /Looking so grumpy.

japanese: ありがとー！/あのお皿、/どうしようか迷ってたんだ。
english: Thanks! /I was wondering  /what to do with that plate.

japanese: あれ、響子先生。/一人でどうしたんですか？
english: Hm, Kyoko-sensei. /What are you doing alone?

japanese: あら……ボーマン。/こんな所に一人でどうしたの？
english: Oh my... Bowman.  /What are you doing here alone?

japanese: あれ、そうだっけ？/去年の話だし、あんまり憶えてないわ。
english: Hm, was that it?  /It was last year, so I don't remember.

japanese: あら、九郎じゃない。/何やってるの？
english: Oh, it's Kuro.  /What are you doing?

japanese: ありがとう、!0！/助かったわ！
あれが……生徒会室ですか？
あれ？/!0に紹介してたっけ？/そうだよ。夕（ゆう）っていうんだけど。
english: Huh?  /Did I introduce him to  !0?  /That's right. His name is Yuu.
